other_tests.findings: findings consistent with early pigmented purpuric dermatosis
mild chronic and focally active gastritis
enlarged periportal lymph nodes, mild splenomegaly
mild bronchial-wall thickening, lymphadenopathy in the axillae and pericardiac regions
hypercellular bone marrow with maturing trilineage hematopoiesis, increased eosinophils, megakaryocytes, and polyclonal plasma cells
intense inflammatory infiltrates predominantly composed of lymphocytes and plasma cells, with approximately 60% IgG4+ plasma cells

other_tests.procedure_name: punch biopsy from left pretibial region
other_tests.date: One month after the initiation of glucocorticoids
other_tests.findings: marked lymphoplasmacytic and eosinophilic infiltrate in a medium-size arteriole
